p: Internationally agreed frameworks for emergency research to facilitate coordination, focus investments, and to guide implementation of responses are needed. These should identify emerging threats and develop roadmaps to focus R&D investments [ 19], as well as ethical, regulatory and operational standards for conducting emergency research [ 1, 7, 13, 19, 27, 35].
